name: Gironda’s 6×6 — ~6 min per exercise
time_per_session_breakdown: 6 sets x ~10s each + 30s rest between sets ≈ 6 min total
overview_and_execution: Perform 6 sets of 6 reps with the same weight, resting only 20–30s between sets. Use around your 8–10RM. Focus on short rests to accumulate volume under fatigue.
example_application: Barbell Curl 6×6 @ 50 lb, 30s rest. Once you can do all sets, add ~5%.
important_notes: Emphasize strict form. Avoid failure on the early sets so you can complete all 6 sets. Effective for hypertrophy via high training density.
